CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Designated person"), "Designated person; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Designated person - Products/completed ops"), "Designated person Products/completed ops; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Mortgagee, Assignee or Receiver"), "Mortgagee, Assignee or Receiver; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Blanket where required by contract"), "Blanket where required by contract; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Owner/lesser of premises"), "Owner/lesser of premises; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Owner/lessor of premises - Products/completed ops"), "Owner/lessor of premises - Products/completed ops; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "State or Governmental agency"), "State or Governmental agency; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "Vendor"), "Vendor; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Blanket_AI__c , "None"), "None", NULL)
CustomField.label: Blanket AI
